title: Cairo Clock for Android Wear
summary: Simple and beautiful clock faces for opensource enthusiasts.
description: This is clock faces for Android Wear Watches.This application would provide simple and beautiful clock faces on your G Watch/Gear live.All Artworks from cairo clock 0.3.4.You can see source codes on https://github.com/ganadist/CairoClockForAndroidWear
descriptionHTML:
This is clock faces for Android Wear Watches.

This application would provide simple and beautiful clock faces on your G Watch/Gear live.

All Artworks from cairo clock 0.3.4.

You can see source codes on https://github.com/ganadist/CairoClockForAndroidWear
comments: Some good faces.... ...some not so good, daylight saving time problem is fixed.

Nice idea Not quite polished enough. The circular faces extend beyond the watch screen on my Samsung live, making them look odd. This is worse in low power mode when the face is shifted to avoid burn in. All the faces look terrible in the low power background modes.
Nice but... I like the faces but they all seem to show one hour behind the actual time.  Any suggestions on what I can do to fix this?
recentChanges: Update image with prerendered svg with fit screen size.
Add image resources for some devices have 320px.
